constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 165 (Thursday, September 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CASTEN:
H.R. 5348.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 18
[Page H5134]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Labor, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Reform, and House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: ESP Family Leave Act
